r.s: Abstracts parsing and rendering rules for Wiki markup in structured plain text.
r.d: Abstracts parsing and rendering rules for Wiki markup in structured plain text.
r.n: * moving state to "beta" even all the desired renderers are not yet in place; the API has for all practical purposes proven to be stable * fixed Bug:2670 (incorrect css_new case in "wikilink" xhtml renderer) * fixed Bug:2916 (parser for "code" does not set all attributes) * implemented Request:2947 (more flexible way to handle wikilinks) -- the wikilink renderer now lets you specify a callback to determine if a page exists or not * implemented Request:2917 (allow dot in interwiki regex parser) * implemented Request:3162 (allow for additional punctuation in interwiki regex parser)
